name: BHU
summary: BHU (for "Beat Her Up") is a fighting game with an all-feminine cast. It is a predecessor to the Schoolgirl Fighting series.

name: BHB: BioHazard Bot
summary:
You are BHB. A BioHazard Bot. Your mission: decontaminate. 
 
When alien creatures overrun a research facility, robotic drones known as BioHazard bots are deployed to deal with a situation too dangerous for regular decontamination crews. Creatures known to the scientists as "floaters" are slowly altering the atmosphere of the facility, allowing the more dangerous creatures to spread. As BHB it is your job to destroy them and halt the infestation in its tracks.

name: BHunter
summary:
The game takes place in one of three flying cars selectable at the start of the game. You rove around in a fully 3D cityscape, a maze of tall buildings while hunting down criminals. Destroy the bad guys with your basic ship's weapons and gain more powerful weapons as the game progresses. You are rewarded with credits for successfully taking down targets.

BHunter also features networked gameplay for up to 8 players via a LAN or the internet.

name: Bhavacakra Grace
summary: Will Grace succeed in her job as a mercenary?

name: BH Trials
summary: BH Trials is a game where you drive a backhoe loader in an unusual way. This digger has no transmission, steering or brakes. Propel yourself with the articulated arm and take on the obstacles on your way. Play solo or team up with up to three friends to take control of a four-legged backhoe beast.

name: Bhavacakra Maco
summary: Not wanting to contest a title with her elder brother who is 11 years senior, she chooses to leave her hometown behind.

name: Bhop PRO
summary: BhopPRO is an amazing game mode where players have to jump on blocks. This game is created to enjoy the gameplay, or to train. There are no victories and winners. Nearly all cards that are used in this mode are designed only for walkthrough. Than the player goes further, moreover, the level becomes more complicated. Here you can play maps on passing with other players, difficulties will cause you interest, and old players will feel nostalgia. Feel new take on the popular bhopping genre.

name: Bhop Craze
summary: Break the record! Beat your friends! Be the fastest of all! Compete with other players for the title of the best player. Run and jump through beautiful levels and discover dozens of mechanics that will give you unbelievable fun in the game!

name: Bhop Pro
summary: You can jump and bunny hop in fps mode with bhop pro. You can prove that you are really a bhop master with the scores and durations you will get. You must continuously turn right or left and synchronously jump at the same time to be able to do successful bunny hops. Bhop Pro is a portable mobile bhop style jumping game. You can get new rankings by doing parkour quests. If you can really do it, you will be a 'bhop pro'.

name: Bhop up!
summary: A bug that became a game mechanic.You will find yourself in an incomprehensible, abstract world, among flying islands and various biomes, in the setting of the Middle Ages.

name: Bher
summary: Delve dungeons, craft items and build relationships as you work to recover your memory. Bher is a town under siege, and you are an amnesiac with nothing to your name. Search dark woods and caves for resources and craft powerful weapons to delve into infested mines, forgotten swamps, and worse.

name: Bharat Police
summary: Lead a police force in noir India. Manage officers, respond to emergencies, and upgrade your team. Navigate crime, corruption, and deep-rooted social tensions. Every decision has consequences.
